versionNo.description: ICEGATE version being used: Default value 1.0

date.description: Date of transmission of message: YYYYMMDD Format

msgTyp.description: The Flag specifying the  action requested on this transmission

jobNo.description: The Unique ID provided by User for this transmission

locOnbrdText.description: A description of the location on the ship of the referenced stores article

qntyOnbrd.description: The number, count, or amount of an article of the referenced ship stores.

qntyCdOnbrd.description: A code representing the units of measured for a referenced quantity onboard.

containerWeight.description: The Verified Gross Mass (VGM) is the weight of the cargo including dunnage and bracing plus the tare weight of the container carrying this cargo in KGS

totalNumberOfPackages.description: The measure of packages being carried in the voyage for particular Transport Equipment

tmSuprtDocs.description: The Details of Supporting Documents provided in reference to the cargo in Transport Document

tagRef.description: The Flag indicating the part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

refSerialNo.description: The Serial number in that part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

subSerialNoRef.description: The Sub Serial Number in that part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

icegateUserid.description: The ICEGATE ID of the User who uploaded this document

irnNmbr.description: The Unique Reference Number given by eSanchit on uploading of this document

docRefNmbr.description: The Unique Reference Number given by the Issuer to this document

docTypCd.description: The Identifier assigned by Customs to identify the type of the document

bnefcryCd.description: The Idenfier of the Beneficiary of this Document

tmAdtnlDec.description: The Details of Additional Declaration provided in reference to this Voyage

tagRef.description: The Flag indicating the part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

refSerialNo.description: The Serial number in that part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

infoTyp.description: The code indicating the type of Additional Declaration being made

infoQualifier.description: The Code indicating the additional declaration being made

infoCd.description: The Response to the additional declaration as a Code

infoText.description: The Response to the additional declaration as a Text

infoMsr.description: The Response to Additional Declaration as a measure

infoDt.description: The Response to Additional Declaration as a date
